duration_in_months: If the contract starts on march 1st and the end date is unknown it may last for 3 months
full_summary:
**Notice of Tender Solicitation: Bases for Interior Flag Poles**

**Title:** Bases for Interior Flag Poles
**Reference Number:** WS4438377800-Doc4442651955
**Publication Date:** February 13, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2024 at 14:00 EST

**Solicitation Details**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) Canada, Events and Conference Management (ECM) – Ceremonial is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers for the supply and delivery of gold-colored classic filled gilt styrene bases for use with interior flag poles.

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity Information**

- **Name of Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) Canada
- **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact Information:**
  - **Name:** Cathleen Almonte (SPAC/PSPC)
  - **Email:** [cathleen.almonte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:cathleen.almonte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  - **Phone:** Not Applicable
  - **Fax:** Not Applicable

**Notice Information**

The tender notice can be accessed electronically through Ariba Discovery. Please see the [notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18783997?extsite=MTg3ODM5OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for further information.

Note: This is a notice from a contractor with limited English literacy skills. Integrity of information is not guaranteed, but you don't have much to work with **(and some mannerisms like 'elle-la-lui / she-her-hers' have been removed as they are found most commonly in US writing).**

**Submission of Bids**

Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid by February 28, 2024 at 14:00 EST to be considered responsive. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
